name: Radiant Typhoon Vision
text:
Activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of "Radiant Typhoon Vision" once per turn);
● Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 "Radiant Typhoon" card or 1 Quick-Play Spell, or, if you do not have any in your hand, discard your entire hand.
● Add 1 "Mystical Space Typhoon" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
If this card is destroyed by the effect of "Mystical Space Typhoon": You can Set this card.
